alert.note: Alert for Southern Gila Foothills, Mimbres Valley; Southern Gila Highlands, Black Range; Southwest Desert, Mimbres Basin; Upper Gila River Valley (New Mexico) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS El Paso (Southern New Mexico and extreme Western Texas)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued May 13 at 8:03PM MDT by NWS El Paso
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of north central Grant County through 830 PM MDT... At 803 PM MDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm near Silver City, moving east at 10 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Tyrone, Silver City, Hurley, Pinos Altos, Cobre, Bayard, Hanover, Fierro, North Hurley, Mimbres, Santa Clara, Fort Bayard, Camp Thunderbird, Georgetown, Arenas Valley, Mangas Valley, Tyrone Mine, Upper Mimbres Valley, Bear Canyon Lake and Little Walnut Village. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. Frequent cloud to ground lightning is occurring with this storm. Lightning can strike 10 miles away from a thunderstorm. Seek a safe shelter inside a building or vehicle.

area.areaDesc: Southern Gila Foothills, Mimbres Valley; Southern Gila Highlands, Black Range; Southwest Desert, Mimbres Basin; Upper Gila River Valley
